subject: Re: DAH!
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
Manual sweep.  Manual: From the word "manu" in latin meaning hand.  Manual sweep: Sweeping the radio dial by hand.  Does anyone have any questions?  Frank, who is giving you a hard time about this?  It sounds absolutely asinine that this even has to be discussed....

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  It's just occuring and I'm being made aware that most here, just don't get
> the concept of manual sweep, depsite the fact that it has been dicussed here
> sin at least 2008. Manual--as in done by freaking hand, as in touching the
> godamn dial!
> 
>  Yeah, I am pissed, cuz no matter what I say it is completely ignored in
> favor of the idiotic ghost hunter rap. Y'all don't understand the sdimplest
> concepts of spirit communcation, but I bet 90% here will claim to be box and
> paranormal experts.
> 
>  Those that do get it, I'm told are too f--- lazy to turn a radio dial, yet
> are somehow more qualified to get higher spirit communication.
> 
>  I don't know what to say, I thought I was totaly fed up before.... Just
> keep chasing yuur retarded lime lights--that's fame a fortune that 99% here
> are really after, and forget I was ever here!
> 
>  Supposedly you have to crawl before you walk, y'all want to skip crawling,
> and walking and fly the space shuttle. Clueless!!
> 
> Frank-S
>
